quoteDoc: CB Payments & COINBASE UK PRIVACY POLICY
quoteText: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time, and when required by law, we will notify you of changes to this Privacy Policy. If we make any material changes we will notify you by email (sent to the e-mail address specified in your account) or by means of a notice on our Services prior to the change becoming effective.
title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
